pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Ark-Server## Connect### Start Listening (connect)Starts the server### Receive Connect Request (accept_wrapper)Connects to a client## DisconnectDisconnects the server### Send Disconnect (send_disconnect)Sends to a client to disconnect with the server### Receive Disconnect (parsed from read)If the server was remotely asked to shut down, it will theninitiate disconnecting to all remote clients too.## Run### Receive Connect RequestAccept the incoming connection### Service the connection#### ReadRead from the incoming connection#### WriteWrite to the incoming connection after reading
